Command *docs*
***************

Documentation for the docs command in */trans/cmds/docs.c*.

Command
=======

USAGE
  |  ``docs``
  |  ``docs refresh``    - rebuild HELP_D.
  |  ``docs playerdoc``  - recreate /help/player/commands.rst

This command shows status of the documentation.
